Pre-Game Insights: Russell Westbrook is playing through wildfires back home in Los Angeles, which has affected his sleep.
Westbrook has a history of playing harder against the Clippers.
Key Match Events: Westbrook snagged an offensive rebound on a missed free throw by DeAndre Jordan, despite being surrounded by teammates and opponents.
Westbrook tipped in Jordan's second consecutive missed free throw, completing a four-point possession.
Post-Match Reflections: Westbrook expressed that it was difficult for him to sleep due to the wildfires in Los Angeles.
He stated that the best thing he can do is to give people joy through his play.
Others: Westbrook scored 19 points, grabbed 6 rebounds, and dished out 8 assists in the game.
He celebrated a 'rock the baby' after drawing an 'and-one' foul in the post against former teammate Norman Powell.
